author: andschwa
body: This resolves #531 and means that the last of our artifacts are deployed automatically by `dotnet`. Note that the compilation of the native library still needs to happen, which is most easily done with `Start-PSBuild`. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/powershell/powershell/748)

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Note that this works on Linux with `dotnet run -c Linux -p src/Microsoft.PowerShell.Linux.Host`. What this really means if that fore Core PowerShell and Linux PowerShell, CLI owns the deployment of all necessary assets. Granted, the native library still needs to be built, but given that, `dotnet run/build` can be used no problem.

title: Enable `dotnet-run`
